{!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.LastName},
Good day.
I hope you have been pleased with the WEX fleet card program so far!
Using GPS vehicle tracking and diagnostics, our innovative solution allows you to get up-to-the-minute reports on the location, speed, and actual operating condition of your vehicles.
These are just some of the available features:
• Vehicle location history • Engine problem alerts • In-vehicle display with two-way messaging • Email alerts for excessive idling, speeding, etc. • Driver behavior scoring • Fuel Guard / Fuel Usage
Many of our customers have reported:
• An increase in driver productivity (customers average a 26% increase in productivity) • A reduction in vehicle fuel consumption (customers average an 11-15% savings in annual fuel costs per vehicle) • A reduction in overtime paid and automation of remote driver time-cards • Elimination of unauthorized vehicle use • Reduction in vehicle repair costs with diagnostic alerts • Recovery of stolen vehicles and supplies • A reduction in annual insurance premiums
The primary method that GPS tracking devices can assist companies is through streamlined efficiency of vehicle driving activity. I'd welcome the opportunity to speak with you about what WEX Inc. can do for you to help improve vehicle and operator efficiency. Can we setup a call with our Telematics coordinator to talk further?
Sincerely,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName}
